name: AVAudioUnitMIDIInstrument
desc: An object that represents music devices or remote instruments.

items.name: init(audioComponentDescription: AudioComponentDescription)
items.desc: Creates a MIDI instrument audio unit with the component description you specify.

items.name: func sendController(UInt8, withValue: UInt8, onChannel: UInt8)
items.desc: Sends a MIDI controller event to the instrument.

items.name: func sendMIDIEvent(UInt8, data1: UInt8)
items.desc: Sends a MIDI event which contains one data byte to the instrument.

items.name: func sendMIDIEvent(UInt8, data1: UInt8, data2: UInt8)
items.desc: Sends a MIDI event which contains two data bytes to the instrument.

items.name: func sendMIDISysExEvent(Data)
items.desc: Sends a MIDI System Exclusive event to the instrument.

items.name: func sendPitchBend(UInt16, onChannel: UInt8)
items.desc: Sends a MIDI Pitch Bend event to the instrument.

items.name: func sendPressure(UInt8, onChannel: UInt8)
items.desc: Sends a MIDI channel pressure event to the instrument.

items.name: func sendPressure(forKey: UInt8, withValue: UInt8, onChannel: UInt8)
items.desc: Sends a MIDI Polyphonic key pressure event to the instrument.

items.name: func sendProgramChange(UInt8, onChannel: UInt8)
items.desc: Sends MIDI Program Change and Bank Select events to the instrument.

items.name: func sendProgramChange(UInt8, bankMSB: UInt8, bankLSB: UInt8, onChannel: UInt8)
items.desc: Sends MIDI Program Change and Bank Select events to the instrument.

items.name: func startNote(UInt8, withVelocity: UInt8, onChannel: UInt8)
items.desc: Sends a MIDI Note On event to the instrument.

items.name: func stopNote(UInt8, onChannel: UInt8)
items.desc: Sends a MIDI Note Off event to the instrument.
